name: Slightly Heroes VR
description: SUIT UP - Step into the role of your imaginary, half-baked superhero in this casual, cross platform VR shooter. Battle solo, online or versus friends in intense free-movement action!
minimum_requirements: OS: OS Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: CPU Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1100 MB available space
